Act Title: THE SUPREME COURT (NUMBER OF JUDGES) ACT, 1956

Act Definition.0: An Act to provide for an increase in the number of Judges of the Supreme Court, excluding the Chief Justice.

paragraphs.0: This act may be called the Supreme Court (Number of Judges) Act, 1956.

Section 2..heading: Maximum number of Supreme Court Judges other than Chief Justice.

paragraphs.0: The maximum number of Judges of the Supreme Court, excluding the Chief Justice of India, shall be 1[thirty-three].

Page 2.0: 1. Subs. by Act 37 of 2019, s. 2, for “thirty” (w.e.f. 09-08-2019).
